column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Alright it's Sat night and the place is packed (~75ppl w/20 waiting?)... we put our names down and the maitre'd tells us it's about an hour wait so come back in 45 mins. Ok no problem
column2: we had found a Bentley to drool over anyways while walking around the neighborhood & killing time.  Came back around 40 mins later and our name isn't on the list... THAT WAS DISAPPOINTING... The same girl said we'll get the next table
column3: but it took another 30 mins or so before we sat down.  By that time the three of us were so hungry
column4: we could've eaten off the table next to us.
